channel.title: [Joke Class Suggestion]The Saiyan
channel.description:
The Saiyan
Neutral Killer
Passive (Bloodline): At night, you are immune to death at power level 2, occupation at power level 3 and target changing at power level 4. You start with power level 1.
Day ability(Charge): Gain a power level. Day ability(Unleash): Lose half of your power levels, rounded down and gain powers at night accordingly.
Night ability(Kamehameha): Attack a player(no power level loss), attack a player and also blind (occupy) the closest player(1-2 power level loss), attack a player and also the closest player(3-4 power level loss) Night ability(Charge II): Gain two power levels.
Note: if your target is 8, the closest player is 7 and 9. If 9 is dead, then 7 is the closest player.
